Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Colorado in 2016...
Injured on 4/26/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/4/2016 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/29/2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2020, winning 2 games with a 1.10 ERA...
Injured on 8/18/2020 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,714 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Colorado to San Francisco on 2/1/2022 (Going to SF: P Jason Billie, P Cliff Jackson. Going to COL: P Alberto Rodriguez, LF Alonzo Alonso, P Edward Lawhon, P Christian McLin, 1B John
Miller)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2022, going 4-0, 1.67...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,714 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $13,000,000 per year...
